thread.title: Drooling Horse

title: Drooling Horse
text:
Only registered TrekEarth members may write critiques. Photographer's Note 
This is the Fountain of Memory known locally as the Drooling Horse Fountain. The famous horse sculpture that loose water by mouth is a tribute to the troopers that came from inside toward Curitiba in the twentieth century and left their horses harnessed in the city center, where they were the biggest shopping spots capital. The fountain was installed in the Plaza Garibaldi in the heart of Curitiba in 1995. It is a work in granite and bronze of the sculptor Ricardo Tod (1963-2005). 
Nobody has marked this note useful
